name: Go Get Mother
description:
You are a young boy who is concerned about your mother not coming home for a long while. So you want to go outside to find her but you need a key to go. Follow your friendly television and you will get what you wanted.

Made with Tuesday JS web visual editor https://kirill-live.itch.io/tuesday-js

Ending bg music: 

 Blooming Melody by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

Creative Commons CC BY 4.0

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

 Decoherence by Scott Buckley | www.scottbuckley.com.au

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

cartoon music by Mixkit https://mixkit.co/free-stock-music/children/
